Title: Competitor's Agent
Text: Have 3 Bugs in the Product at the same time.

Title: Circle Mania
Text: Your turn: Connect a Feature with a circular connector.

Title: Square Obsession
Text: Your turn: Connect a Feature with a square connector.

Title: Diamond Craze
Text: Your turn: Connect a Feature with a diamond connector.

Title: Overperformer
Text: Your turn: Close 3 Tickets in one turn.

Title: Overkill
Text: Have 5 more Story Points in the Product than needed for the current Milestone.

Title: Incredible Impact
Text: Your turn: Place a Feature that has 8 Story Points.

Title: Solid Work
Text: Your turn: Place a Feature that has 4 Story Points.

Title: Daily Job
Text: Your turn: Place a Feature that has 2 Story Points.

Title: I'm An Engineer
Text: Your turn: Move a Feature to a different place in the Product.

Title: Dedicated Worker
Text: Your turn: Place 6 or more counters on a single Ticket.

Title: Optionality As A Blessing
Text: Have 4 or more cards in your hand.

Title: Delusions Of Grandeur
Text: Have 10 Completed Features in the Product.

Title: Stockpiling
Text: Have 2x or more Tickets on a Feature than it has Story Points.

Title: Smart Move
Text: Your turn: Place a Feature so that it's adjacent to 2 other cards.

Title: Brilliant Move
Text: Your turn: Place a Feature so that it's adjacent to 3 other cards.

Title: Genius Move
Text: Your turn: Place a Feature so that it's adjacent to 4 other cards.
